data.name: Doomsday Paradise
data.detailed_description:
Doomsday Paradise is a multiplayer RPG about partying during the end of the world.

The game is set in Sunset Town- a beachside paradise stuck in an endless spring break before the apocalypse. Band together with your friends to tell a unique story every game- where literally everyone's choices matter and can lead to a multitude of unique endings. Power yourself up and give a go at saving the world- or sit back, grab a drink, and watch the sparks fly.


Play the game your own way. Competitive? Compete for score and battle to become a legendary hero! Want to band together? Switch to cooperative mode, and team up to get a new high score! Want a REAL laid back experience? Turn off combat! The game is yours to play however you like.


The game has hundreds of events and a multitude of unique endings, enemies, items, skills, and friends to find. The story threads build off one another but branch off into a thousand different directions- no two games will ever feel the same but all of them will feel meaningful and impactful.

data.short_description: Doomsday Paradise is a multiplayer RPG where you put off saving the world so you can party instead.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 2000
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game should run on almost anything
